timeline.bodyText:
I don't have exact words for it, but we could mention two things:

The submitter should make sure not to expose any credentials accidentally when including files or snippets
The reproduction steps, requests, and responses should form a minimal reproducible example, if possible - it is harder to try and spot an error in megabytes of logs than looking at a smallish configuration object.
